summary: Changes the appearance of your favourite College apprentice to be much more seemly. Gone is the ridiculous hair style befitting of a high-and-mighty dictatoress...
descriptionHtml:
If you wanted to marry this adorable College apprentice but were thrown off by her hairstyle (once you finally got a look under the hood), then this mod is probably for you. Probably.

It\'s just a very quick and simple mod I threw together in the Creation Kit - none of this NPC Editor nonsense - to change Brelyna Maryon\'s hairstyle, skin colour, and a few other small facial tweaks. I also changed her default outfit to be hoodless. But note that she\'s still wearing her mage robes by default - the outfit in the screenshots was only used to demonstrate the neck seam fix, as her default outfit covers her neck.

The hairstyle is still one of the vanilla ones - if you\'re looking for a fancy ApachiiSkyHair hairstyle, then you would probably be better off going for one of the mods below:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15905]Sultry Brelyna Maryon[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8316]Better looking Brelyna Maryon[/url]

Finally, the mods used for the screenshots are as follows:
Face: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen[/url] (look 3)
Body: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes[/url]
Elf Races: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273/]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]

Coverwomen (and CBBE) is required if you want her to look like she does for me in the screenshots. I\'ve no idea what she\'ll look like with different face textures.

Enjoy.

Also, check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27588/]Exciting Skill Ranks[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27873/]Dawnfang and Duskfang - Fully Functional[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17829/]Disenchant God Amulets WITH Talos Fix[/url]
author: Jules
